data.comment: Arsenal Tula kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Alex Kral is back on his feet again.
In the minute 2, Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Aleksandr Sobolev's header is off-target for Spartak Moscow.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Arsenal Tula, close to Spartak Moscow's area.
In the minute 4, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 9, Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 12, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Arsenal Tula will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Spartak Moscow.
Daniil Lesovoy (Arsenal Tula) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 14, Jordan Larsson of Spartak Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
The match at Otkritie Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Georgi Kostadinov, who is down injured.
In the minute 17, Arsenal Tula's Georgi Kostadinov is back in action after a slight knock.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 24, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
In the minute 28, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Artem Sokol for Arsenal Tula has been booked by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
Spartak Moscow to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In the minute 33, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Georgi Kostadinov.
Georgi Kostadinov for Arsenal Tula is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 35, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 36, In Moscow, Vladislav Panteleyev of Arsenal Tula is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Daniil Khlusevich is on target to give Arsenal Tula a 0-1 advantage.
Kings Kangwa with an assist there.
Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 39, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
Aleksandr Sobolev levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 41, Zelimkhan Bakaev instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Vladislav Panteleyev (Arsenal Tula) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 45, Daniil Lesovoy in Arsenal Tula has been yellow-carded a second time by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin and is being sent off.
In the minute 45, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin waits before resuming play because Alex Kral for Spartak Moscow is still down.
Samuel Gigot heads in to make it 2-1 at Otkritie Arena.
That's a fine assist from Jordan Larsson.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin blows to start the second-half. Spartak Moscow with the kick-off.
Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Ayrton Lucas gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Arsenal Tula defender.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Daniil Khlusevich for the away team is judged to be offside.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Otkritie Arena.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
In the minute 53, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 57, The home team have replaced Zelimkhan Bakaev with Guus Til. This is the first substitution made today by Domenico Tedesco.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
Guus Til is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
Sergey Podpaliy is making the team's first substitution at Otkritie Arena with Lameck Banda replacing Evans Kangwa.
In the minute 69, Domenico Tedesco (Spartak Moscow) is making a third substitution, with Oston Urunov replacing Nail Umyarov.
Arsenal Tula make their second substitution with Igor Gorbatenko replacing Vladislav Panteleyev.
Guus Til (Spartak Moscow) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Andrey Eshchenko.
In the minute 70, Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Kings Kangwa (Arsenal Tula) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Arsenal Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
In the minute 71, Free kick Arsenal Tula.
Samuel Gigot (Spartak Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Igor Gorbatenko gets his shot on target but fails to score for Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 73, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Valeri Gromyko for Arsenal Tula who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 78, Goran Causic is on a sub for Kings Kangwa for Arsenal Tula.
Valeri Gromyko is back on the pitch.
Sergey Tkachyov is replacing Georgi Kostadinov for Arsenal Tula at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 80, Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Alex Kral (Spartak Moscow) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Otkritie Arena.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 84, The away team have replaced Daniil Khlusevich with Aleksandr Dovbnya. This is the fifth substitution made today by Sergey Podpaliy.
Spartak Moscow's Jordan Larsson gets in a shot on goal at Otkritie Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow attack but Samuel Gigot's header doesn't find the target.
Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Moscow.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The home team replace Jordan Larsson with Reziuan Mirzov.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Arsenal Tula's half?
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Moscow Arsenal Tula attack through Sergey Tkachyov. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
That's full-time at Otkritie Arena. The final score is 2-1.
Arsenal Tula's Goran Causic has been booked in Moscow.
